description.value: Once every 10 minutes, you can use a single action with the concentrate trait to project your senses into your familiar. When you do, you lose all sensory information from your own body, but can sense through your familiar's body for up to 1 minute. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this effect.
